channel.title: Range fix
channel.description:
how to fix the range skill so that all arrows work and not just rune???
***i would also like to know how to make it so that you can make it so that when a staff is eqiuped you can assign a spell to atk with***
P.S. my server is finally starting to look like what i want it to look like..... only a few more minor adjustments and edits(finishing touch).... :)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Edit: will some one tell me a solution plz im been waiting for a while now....

item.title: Range fix
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Search

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)

Change to

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) || (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == ARROWIDHERE))

You can keep adding them using that format.

Read full topic
